For your information, this call is solved (see the tutorial on the website) in cvs. However because the last Teneo build was not copied to the download section of eclipse.org the solution is not yet available. The latest build of Teneo which is inline with the elver.org website can be downloaded here:
http://emft.eclipse.org/emft/downloads/index.php?project=teneo&showAll=0&showMax=10&sortBy=date

gr. Martin
